summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 13th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 83rd Street; by construction of sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8826 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
